name: Enemy Rush
description:
You are a human, trapped in a dungeon full of goblins, your only purpose is to entertain a bored king, but your goal is to get freedom.

Combat goblins, and survive the waves for get what you want, but lookout, if the timer in the bomb gets to 0, you die!  So don't slow down and kill the most goblins you can to reset the timer.

Controls:

MOVE:  W A S D                                                                                                                                        SHOOT:  LEFT MOUSE BUTTON                                                                                                  RELOAD: R                                                                                                                                            UPGRADE: 1 2 3
